Pawtucket.Pawtucket Times Building:
The Pawtucket Times Building is an historic site at 23 Exchange Street in the historic central business district of Pawtucket, Rhode Island.


== History ==
This five story masonry building was erected in 1895 to house the facilities of the Pawtucket Times, which was founded in 1885 and continues to operate from the building. In 1920 the Times added a large addition housing a printing plant, fronting on North Union Street.
